alert.note: Alert for Mazatzal Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 2:56PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila and Maricopa Counties through 330 PM MST... At 256 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sycamore Creek, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sycamore Creek, Sunflower, Punkin Center and Tonto Basin. This includes AZ Route 87 between mile markers 216 and 229. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Mazatzal Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Tonto Basin
